About-Us.p1: At Kids Planet, we believe every child deserves to feel special. That's why we created a world filled with outfits that reflect their innocence and bring joy and style to every moment.
About-Us.p2: Kids Planet is not just a name; it's a family that gathers everyone who values the magic of childhood.
About-Us.p3: Our mission is not just to provide clothing but to deliver an experience that makes kids feel happy and confident every step of the way.
About-Us.p4: For our beloved kids, Kids Planet.
About-Us.pV1: Our goal is to be the go-to destination for kids' fashion that combines quality and innovation while creating a shopping experience that meets families' needs.
About-Us.pM1: Our mission is to offer clothing that combines comfort and beauty, becoming part of kids' everyday lives and keeping them always radiant and unique.

privacy-policy.p1: Welcome to Kids Planet! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you visit our website, interact with our products, or services, or otherwise engage with us.
privacy-policy.p2: By accessing or using our website, you agree to the terms and conditions of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not access our website or use our services.
privacy-policy.lt1: When you register an account with us, we collect your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.
privacy-policy.lt2: When you make a purchase, we collect billing and payment information.
privacy-policy.lt3: When you contact us for customer support or other inquiries, we may collect your contact information and any information you voluntarily provide to us.
privacy-policy.pt2: We collect information about how you interact with our website, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, device information, and browsing behavior.
privacy-policy.pt3: We may use the information we collect for the following purposes:
privacy-policy.lt41: To provide, personalize, and improve our website, products, and services.
privacy-policy.lt42: To process transactions and deliver products you have ordered.
privacy-policy.lt43: To communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries and providing customer support.
privacy-policy.lt44: To send you promotional emails, newsletters, or other marketing communications if you have opted in to receive them.
privacy-policy.pt4: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this Privacy Policy or as required by law. We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or providing services to you.
privacy-policy.pt5: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy-policy.pt6: You have the right to access, correct, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time by following the unsubscribe instructions provided in the communication or by contacting us directly.
privacy-policy.pt7: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes to this Privacy Policy by posting the updated version on our website with a new effective date.
privacy-policy.pt8: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at

terms-of-service.p1: Welcome to Kids Planet! These Terms of Service govern your access to and use of our website, products, and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website or services.
terms-of-service.p2: You must be at least 18 years old or have the permission of a legal guardian to use our services. You agree to use our services for lawful purposes only and in accordance with these Terms of Service.
terms-of-service.p3: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. Notify us immediately if you suspect any unauthorized use of your account.
terms-of-service.p4: All content on our website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Kids Planet and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute our content without our explicit permission.
terms-of-service.p5: Kids Planet is not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our services.
terms-of-service.p6: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to our services at our sole discretion, without notice, for any reason, including but not limited to a breach of these Terms of Service.
terms-of-service.p7: Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these terms will be resolved through arbitration in accordance with the applicable rules.
terms-of-service.p8: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. You are responsible for checking this page regularly to stay informed of any changes.
terms-of-service.p9: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at

shipping-policy.p1: We offer shipping services within Egypt. Orders are typically processed and shipped within 3-5 working days, excluding weekends and holidays. Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a confirmation email with tracking information.
shipping-policy.p2: Shipping costs and delivery times may vary depending on your location and the shipping method selected at checkout.
shipping-policy.p3: Shipping rates are calculated based on the weight of your order and your shipping address. You can view the shipping cost for your order during the checkout process.
shipping-policy.p4: We currently only offer shipping within EGYPT, We do not offer international shipping at this time.
shipping-policy.p5: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email.
shipping-policy.p61: If you encounter any issues with the delivery of your order, please contact us immediately at
shipping-policy.p62: We will work with the shipping carrier to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
shipping-policy.p73: for information on returns and exchanges.
shipping-policy.p8: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. You are responsible for checking this page regularly to stay informed of any changes.
shipping-policy.p9: If you have any questions or concerns about our shipping policy, please contact us at

return-and-refund-policy.p1: We accept returns on products only if the packaging is unopened and in its original condition. Due to the nature of products, we cannot accept returns on products that have been opened or used.
return-and-refund-policy.p2: To initiate a return, please contact us at
return-and-refund-policy.p21: within 15 days of receiving your order. Please include your order number and the reason for the return in your email.
return-and-refund-policy.p3: Once your return is approved, you will be responsible for returning the item to us in its original packaging. Shipping costs for returns are non-refundable.
return-and-refund-policy.pt21: Upon receiving and inspecting the returned item, we will issue a refund for the purchase price of the item, minus any applicable shipping charges. Please allow 5 days for the refund to be processed and credited back to your original method of payment.
return-and-refund-policy.pt31: We only offer exchanges for products if the original packaging was damaged during shipping. If you receive a damaged item, please contact us at
return-and-refund-policy.pt312: within 5 days of receiving your order to request an exchange. Please include your order number and photos of the damaged packaging in your email.
return-and-refund-policy.pt32: Once your exchange is approved, we will provide instructions for returning the damaged item to us. Upon receiving the returned item, we will ship out a replacement item to you free of charge.
return-and-refund-policy.pt41: If you have any questions or concerns about our return and refund policy, please contact us at

NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.desc: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
